page.title: 09Homelife
page.content: Day begins for the family at{7 am}by switching on the radio or TV. Breakfast for children is usually cereals or toast with a fruit drink. Adults enjoy tea or coffee with their breakfast. Most adult males leave the village by{7.30-8 am}for their daily employment. Secondary school children leave the villages at{8.30 am}for Alford or Louth. Several married women have part or full time jobs. Mid-day meals are usually snacks. Evening meals for the family comprising hot meat dish, vegetables & a sweet is served. Evening recreation is watching TV, gardening, knitting, sewing, reading. Most families have pets, dogs & cats being favoured. Little or no outside stimulation is provided for children who amuse themselves riding bicycles. Most lights go out by{11 pm.
